ID_PICTURE_SUBTITLE: Lastly, take a pic of your Government ID card
SELFIE_PICTURE_SUBTITLE: Take a pic of your face
STEP_ERROR: There was an error trying to send your information. Please try again.
SEFLIE_PRE_TEXT: Please take a selfie. This picture will strictly be used to compare to your government-issued ID, for security purposes.
ID_PRE_TEXT: Please take a picture of your government-issued ID, such as your driver's license or passport. This picture will strictly be used verify your name and date of birth and to compare to your selfie, for security purposes.
SUMMARY_HEADER_TEXT: Your verification request has been received. Your application is in review. Thank you!
INTRO_CONTENT: We need to verify your ID by taking a photo of you and your government issued ID card. We also need to verify your address with a valid proof of address, such as a utility bill. When you click the button below, you will be prompted to grant access to your phone or computer's camera.
GLOBAL_FOOTER_TEXT:
Why is this required?

We must verify your identity and address in order to let you use our products. Our system diligently compares your government-issued ID, your selfie, and your proof-of-address document to reliably establish your age, identity, and address.

Our diligence demonstrates the highest levels of compliance and social responsibility to consumers, parents, law enforcement agencies, and regulatory bodies.
